settings.title: Popular Questions
settings.faq_data:
How much should I take of each supplement?:Curalin:
On days 1&2 of use, take 1 capsule with every meal.
On days 3&4, take 1 capsule 30 minutes after each meal.
Day 5+, take 2 capsules 30 minutes after each meal.
Never exceed 6 capsules per day.

Fungi Immune Booster:
Take 2 capsules once per day.
For best results take 20-30 min before a meal with an 8oz. glass of water.

Immune Gummies:
Take 2 gummies once per day.
For best results take 20-30 min before a meal with an 8oz. glass of water.

Always consult a doctor before taking a new supplement. | Is this bundle for me?:If you're looking to maintain a healthy blood sugar level and support the strength of your immune system, this is a great product for you. Consult your doctor before taking any supplement. | Where are the products made?:Immune Booster and Immune Gummies are made right here in the USA! Curalin is powdered in India and capsuled and bottled in the USA. |Are these supplements certified?", "answer": "All of our supplements are made in NSF and GMP certified, and FDA registered facilities. | Can I take these supplements alongside my medications?:Generally speaking, these supplements are very safe. However, always consult your doctor before starting on a new supplement.
